description: Non-material amendment application following a grant of planning permission ref: P2023/2875/S73 dated 01/12/2023 for Section 73 application (Minor Material Amendment) to vary condition 2 (Drawings) of Planning Permission Reference: P2023/0524/S73 dated 26/05/2023 for Section 73 application (Minor Material Amendment) to vary condition 2 (Drawings) of Planning Permission Reference: P2021/2951/FUL dated 20/12/2021 for replacement of existing single glazed timber windows with double glazed timber windows to the front and rear elevations.' amendments seek to increase the approved glazing thickness from 12mm to 24mm. Latest amendments seek to retain the already approved 24mm glazing thickness, with alterations to the associated window type B detail drawings - primarily changing a fixed panel to a top fan light.' Latest non-material amendment seeks to alter the width of the approved mullion detail by a further 21mm.
